1.panel_description: Summarize the impact of global weather patterns on financial markets in September 2024.

1.handles: General summary of weather impact on financial markets

input_vars.name: query_weather_finance
input_vars.description: Query to get a summary of weather impact on financial markets
input_vars.value: Impact of global weather patterns on financial markets in September 2024

output_vars.name: weather_finance_summary
output_vars.description: Summary of weather impact on financial markets
output_vars.value: "The impact of global weather patterns, particularly those associated with climate change and extreme weather events, on financial markets is multifaceted and significant. Key points include underestimation of risks, financial market volatility, climate change impacts, sector-specific effects, pricing and risk management, and the use of climate scenarios. As of September 2024, financial markets continue to grapple with accurately pricing in climate-related risks, affecting financial stability, market volatility, and sector performance."

2.handles: Fetches news articles related to weather impact on financial markets

input_vars.name: weather_finance_summary
input_vars.value: "Impact of global weather patterns on financial markets, climate change, financial stability, market volatility, sector performance"

output_vars.name: news_articles
output_vars.description: News articles related to weather impact on financial markets
output_vars.value:
1. Title: Joel Makower Archive
       Description: Joel Makower Archive
       Url: https://www.greenbiz.com/temp/JoelMakowerArchive
